title: Countries with the lowest fertility rate globally 2050 to 2055
yAxis: Average number of children per woman
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Average number of children per woman in the y axis.
The Average number of children per woman is highest at Country Brunei Darussalam and lowest at Country Singapore.
The highest Country Brunei Darussalam has 0.21 more Average number of children per woman than the lowest Country Singapore.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of children per woman for 25 number of Countrys.
The Average number of children per woman is appeared to be the highest at Country Brunei Darussalam and lowest at Country Singapore.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Average number of children per woman in the y axis.
The Average number of children per woman is highest at Country Brunei Darussalam and lowest at Country Singapore.
The highest Country Brunei Darussalam has 0.21 more Average number of children per woman than the lowest Country Singapore.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of children per woman for 25 number of Countrys.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
There is a difference of 0.21 between the maximum Country Brunei Darussalam and minimum Country Singapore.
Country Brunei Darussalam is higher than any other Countrys with value 1.59, followed by Canada, and Canada. Down to Country Singapore with the lowest value 1.38.
Similar Average number of children per woman is found in Country Brunei Darussalam, Portugal, Spain, and Canada.
The Country Singapore tends to be 1.04 percent lower than average.
The Average number of children per woman is 38.19 if we add up values of all Countrys.
